title: Omnixis
summary: A tetris-like game made in HaxeFlixel for Ludum Dare 35. Only difference is instead of tetrominoes falling from above, they fall from all directions!
long_summary: A tetris-like game made in HaxeFlixel for Ludum Dare 35. Only difference is instead of tetrominoes falling from above, they fall from all directions! Somehow, this humble game ranked 23/3000 for most innovative entry.

gallery.caption: The game keeps a highscore like an arcade game

gallery.alt: A bunch of connected Tetris blocks spanning in all directions haphazardly.
gallery.caption: Don't let the blocks get to the edges!
